Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.theme.base

Interface CornerTheme<T extends CornerTheme<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the dynamic theme.
All Superinterfaces:
BaseTheme<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AppTheme, AppWidgetTheme
public interface CornerTheme<T extends CornerTheme<T>> extends BaseTheme<T>
A BaseTheme to implement the corner theme.
